column1: Another type of bypass surgery does not use the heart-lung bypass machine.
Your doctor may use a vein, called the saphenous vein, from your leg.
- A blood vessel in your chest, called the internal mammary artery (IMA), can also be used as the graft.
The most common one is the radial artery in your wrist.
Coronary arteries are the vessels that supply your heart with oxygen and nutrients that are carried in your blood.
Coronary artery bypass surgery can be used to improve blood flow to your heart.
If you are taking clopidogrel (Plavix), talk with your surgeon about when to stop taking it.
- You may be asked to wash your whole body below your neck with a special soap.
